full_output.summary: As a final-year CSE student with a passion for real-world applications, I bring expertise in full-stack web development .I have successfully completed numerous realistic web development projects, demonstrating my proficiency in both front- end and back-end technologies such as react.js,node.js,SQL,MongoDB,Firebase,etc. Additionally,I have a strong understanding of data structures and algorithms, which helps me solve problems quickly and create effective solutions. I am excited to use my skills and knowledge as part of a creative team during my internship.

projects.name: Artist website

-Made a website for artists using JavaScript where they can upload their songs and song details.
-Used Google Firebase for authentication and storage.

projects.name: Family Travel Tracker

projects.name: To Do List
projects.description:
-Used Node.js and Express.js for the framework.
-You can add, edit, delete items from the list.
-Used Postgresql for database, all the operations are updated simultaneously into the database.
